howToPlay.gameplay: Basic pinball rules apply: hit bumpers and make loops to get points. There are hidden triggers in the table that can unlock further possibilities that allow you to increase your score even more. The higher your score, the higher your satisfaction in life. You can also choose to bump the table if you wish to give your ball an added impulse, but don't do it too often or the machine will tilt and you will lose a round!
howToPlay.keyboardDescr: Use the left and right arrow keys to move the left and right flippers. Press the spacebar to bump the table.
howToPlay.touchscreenDescr: Tap the left or right side of the screen to move the left or right flippers. Swipe up to bump the table.

about.introduction: ArbiPinball is a mini app on Arbitrum with weekly tournaments. Players pay a fixed entry fee in ETH to enter, and 100% of entry fees fund the prize pot. After the tournament ends, prizes are distributed among the top winners according to the configured split (e.g., top 3: 50/30/20).
